body_text: The Identicon API is not supposed to change over time, so we should set cache headers to mark it as cacheable for a long time, and also mark it as immutable. This matches the behavior we use for static assets and other hash-addressed content, like action implementations.
body_html: The Identicon API is not supposed to change over time, so we should set cache headers to mark it as cacheable for a long time, and also mark it as immutable. This matches the behavior we use for static assets and other hash-addressed content, like action implementations.
title: Identicon API should have long lived cache headers.
body: The Identicon API is not supposed to change over time, so we should set cache headers to mark it as cacheable for a long time, and also mark it as immutable. This matches the behavior we use for static assets and other hash-addressed content, like action implementations.
